<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes/><order>2</order><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>d4d05525474d061051711288c26d43a0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="sn_bpe" source="x_13131_bpe">46be477b4774021051711288c26d432c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="sn_bpe">46be477b4774021051711288c26d432c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_d4d05525474d061051711288c26d43a0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="cl100k_base Validation">ec7c05ed470d061051711288c26d43ae</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=d4d05525474d061051711288c26d43a0"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>d4d05525474d061051711288c26d43a0</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>98d05565474d061051711288c26d43a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, params, stepResult, assertEqual) {

const TEXT_TO_TEST = `Many words map to one token, but some don't: indivisible.

Unicode characters like emojis may be split into many tokens containing the underlying bytes: ü§öüèæ

Sequences of characters commonly found next to each other may be grouped together: 1234567890`;
const REFERENCE_ENCODING = [8607, 4339, 2472, 311, 832, 4037, 11, 719, 1063, 1541, 956, 25, 3687, 23936, 382, 35020, 5885, 1093, 100166, 1253, 387, 6859, 1139, 1690, 11460, 8649, 279, 16940, 5943, 25, 11410, 97, 248, 9468, 237, 122, 271, 1542, 45045, 315, 5885, 17037, 1766, 1828, 311, 1855, 1023, 1253, 387, 41141, 3871, 25, 220, 4513, 10961, 16474, 15];
const { Tokenizer} = require('./src/Tokenizer.js');
const tokenizer = new Tokenizer('c14ba3f74738021051711288c26d430c');
const output = tokenizer.encode(TEXT_TO_TEST);
assertEqual({
				name: "Encoding of " + TEXT_TO_TEST + " should match OpenAI Tokenizer:  https://platform.openai.com/tokenizer",
				shouldbe: REFERENCE_ENCODING.toString(),
				value: output.toString()
		}); 
})(outputs, steps, params, stepResult, assertEqual);

</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>d4d05525474d061051711288c26d43a0</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>d4d05565474d061051711288c26d43a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-19 19:14:27</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
